text: Tagaytay City is a 2nd class Component city in the province of Cavite, It also known as the 2nd Summer capital of the Philippines after Baguio and nicknamed as the city of Pines in South Luzon. ==Geography== It is the highest peak point in the province. The Mount Sungay or the "People's Park in the Sky" is one of the tourist attractions in the Philippines. It borders the Taal Volcano in Talisay to the south, Calamba City to the east, Silang to the north and Mendez to the west. Category:Cities in the Philippines Category:Cavite
title: Tagaytay
